response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value and potential for you. This extraordinary opportunity is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to extend an exclusive offer to make it accessible to you. I propose to sell this product to you for $950,000. This offer represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this special arrangement. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
